use_cases:
["Whole genome sequencing of Endozoicomonas sp. OPT23",
"Genome assembly using Velvet v1.2.10",
"Scaffolding using SSPACE_Standard v3.0",
"Gap filling using GapFiller v1.10",
"Genome annotation using PROKKA v1.12",
"Functional assignment of predicted coding sequences using eggNOG database v4.5",
"Prediction of clusters of orthologous groups (COGs) using eggNOG-mapper tool v1.0.3",
"Construction of a genome tree using OrthoFinder v2.3.1 and IQ-TREE v1.6.1",
"Calculation of average nucleotide identity (ANI) and in silico DNA-DNA hybridization (DDH) estimates using Pyani and GGDC 2.1",
"Prediction of genome-specific genes using GET_HOMOLOGUES v3.0 and OrthoFinder v2.3.1",
"Annotation of genome-specific genes using essential gene database",
"Prediction of eukaryotic-like proteins (ELPs) such as ankyrin repeats, tetratricopeptide repeats, and Sel1 repeats",
"Screening and classification of secretion systems using BlastKOALA and SecReT6",
"Prediction of type VI and type III secretion system effector proteins using SecretEPDB and FIMO v5.05"]
